p: The veterinary surveillance program, which involved 15 Italian wetlands, chosen for the presence of many aquatic birds, including some migratory birds, aimed to detect WNV introduction [ 8]. In fact, the West Nile virus is maintained in nature in an enzootic transmission cycle that primarily involves mosquitoes ( Culex spp.) and birds [ 10, 11, 12]. Humans, horses, and other mammals are incidental hosts because they generally develop an inadequate viremia to infect susceptible mosquitoes [ 13, 14, 15].
